dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. In upper margin: Meyer's Hand-Atlas no. 33. Includes 9 drawings of facades of buildings: "Grössen-Vergleichung der vornehmsten Gebäude in und um Madrid." Probably issued in: Grosser Hand-Atlas über alle Theile der Erde. Hildburghausen : Bibliographisches Institut, 1843-1860.
dct_publisher_sm: Hildburghausen ; Amsterdam ; Paris ; Philadelphia : Verlag des Bibliographisches Instituts, 1844.
